pullrequest.title: Fix compile error due gazebo::common::Color and sdformat

content.raw:
No they shouldn't be removed. This is very strange. I don't see these lines in the Changelog.md, and I don't see them in the diff either. 

```diff
$ hg diff -r default:variant_does_not_contain_color Changelog.md
diff -r a3eb517b0fa5 -r be94b93fdece Changelog.md
--- a/Changelog.md      Thu Nov 02 18:21:56 2017 +0000
+++ b/Changelog.md      Fri Nov 03 08:17:19 2017 -0700
@@ -2,6 +2,9 @@
 
 ## Gazebo 9.x.x (2018-xx-xx)
 
+1. Fix compile error with due to using gazebo::common::Color with sdformat 6
+    * [Pull request #2786](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/2786)
+
 1. Mark constructors as explicit to fix cppcheck warnings
     * [Pull request #2790](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/2790)
     * [Pull request #2795](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/2795)
```

How did you find/comment on this?  Any mercurial magicians know what's going on here?
content.html:
No they shouldn't be removed. This is very strange. I don't see these lines in the Changelog.md, and I don't see them in the diff either. 

$ hg diff -r default:variant_does_not_contain_color Changelog.md
diff -r a3eb517b0fa5 -r be94b93fdece Changelog.md
--- a/Changelog.md      Thu Nov 02 18:21:56 2017 +0000
+++ b/Changelog.md      Fri Nov 03 08:17:19 2017 -0700
@@ -2,6 +2,9 @@

 ## Gazebo 9.x.x (2018-xx-xx)

+1. Fix compile error with due to using gazebo::common::Color with sdformat 6
+    * [Pull request #2786](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/2786)
+
 1. Mark constructors as explicit to fix cppcheck warnings
     * [Pull request #2790](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/2790)
     * [Pull request #2795](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/2795)

How did you find/comment on this? Any mercurial magicians know what's going on here?
